cast.name: Maria Alice Vergueiro Maria Alice Vergueiro
若希爱·安特鲁 Josie Antello

writer.name: 佩德罗·安东尼奥 Pedro Antônio

director.name: 佩德罗·安东尼奥 Pedro Antônio

introduction: Fazendo Meu Filme tells the story of Fani (Bela Fernandes), a 16-year-old girl who passionately dreams about cinema and whose best friend Leo (Xande Valois) is always by her side. Fani is constantly thinking of her life as a movie in which each friend and each romance has a prominent role. During the school year, her mother insists she participate in a selection for an exchange program. Fani passed the test and will now spend a year in London. The prospect of leaving the country scares her, and she is soon forced to face her feelings and internal conflicts after she realizes she has fallen in love with someone unexpected. Based on the bestseller by Paula Pimenta.
